data.title: Birthday: Hiten fell in love with this actress even after being married
data.meta_description: Today is the birthday of TV actor Hiten Tejwani. Today Hiten has turned 46 years old. He is a very good actor and host of TV. You all must h... | News Track
data.text:
Today is the birthday of TV actor Hiten Tejwani. Today Hiten has turned 46 years old. He is a very good actor and host of TV. You all must have seen him hosting Savdhaan India. He has been seen in many shows so far. He got recognition on the small screen from Ekta Kapoor's serial 'Kyunki Saans Bhi Kabhi Bahu Thi' and 'Kutumbh'. After doing these shows, he became popular and he got work in many shows. He also appeared in the show Bigg Boss as well. After this show, Hiten became more popular and people became crazy about him.

"I felt bad that Rashmi trusted someone so much", says Siddharth Shukla

He appeared in Bigg Boss house as a settled person who touched everyone's hearts. On Hiten's birthday, we are going to tell you about his love story which was very fantastic. He is married to actress Gauri Pradhan. Hiten was going to Bangalore to shoot an ad film and during that time he met Gauri at the airport. After that he liked Gauri but the two never talked about the set. After finishing the shooting of Ad film, both returned to their respective work.

This on-screen siblings tied in marriage

About 6 months after that, both met in the serial 'Kutumbh'. Gauri has told that she did not like Hiten at all. He was married. When the audience liked the pair of both in the show 'Kutumbh', both came close. After that Ekta cast Hiten and Gauri in many of their serials which included Ghar Ek Mandir and 'Kyunki Saans Bhi Kabhi Bahu Thi'. After working in shows, both started liking each other. Both dated each other for many years and then in the year 2001, Hiten divorced his first wife and married Gauri.
